resources.string: No mood logs available!\nTap + to add.
Provdie instant, interactive and confidential online emotional support chat service. It is developed and run by The Samaritan Befrienders Hong Kong.
Provide text-based online counseling for young people aged 11-35(24 hour). Youngsters could ventilate their sufferings and stress when they feel necessary.
Provide diversified services including emotional support, crisis intervention, education and training
Provide facts and news regarding topics including mental health, mental disorder, suicide, etc.
Enquiry related to mental illnesses, related treatment and support (24 hour)
